# SEQ18 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 18 focuses on entrances, gardens, courtyards, roofs and terraces

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl111, apl112, apl113, apl114, apl115, apl116, apl117, apl118, apl119

## Emergent Phenomena
Transitions between inside and outside that extend the usable space and connect building to site

## Overview
This sequence contains 9 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
